wikipedia_page.main: Audra Thomas (née Cunningham) is a Northern Irish television presenter. She is a continuity announcer and newsreader on UTV.

response: *Audra Thomas, a Northern Irish television presenter who is currently a continuity announcer and newsreader on UTV
